co.cask.cdap.api.dataset

Interface Updatable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositeDatasetAdmin

    public interface Updatable
    Interface implemented by DatasetAdmin that have a way to update the dataset after reconfiguration. It is optional for a DatasetAdmin to implement this interface; if not implemented, the dataset system will assume that this dataset does need any actions to be performed on update (other than updating its spec).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void update(DatasetSpecification oldSpec)
      Updates the dataset instance after it has been reconfigured.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(DatasetSpecification oldSpec)
            throws IOException
        Updates the dataset instance after it has been reconfigured. This method that will be called during dataset update, on a DatasetAdmin that was created using the new dataset spec, before that new spec is saved. That is, if this method fails, then the update fails and no dataset metadata has been changed.
        Parameters:
        oldSpec - the specification of the dataset before reconfiguration
        Throws:
        IOException
